price: 35. Y decían: “Nosotros tenemos más riquezas e hijos y no seremos castigados”.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
